venue.name: Estadio Gran Canaria
venue.address: Calle Fondos del Segura, s/n, 35019 Las Palmas, Spain

Presidential Box.Description: Exclusive seating area offering the best view and luxury experience at Estadio Gran Canaria.
Presidential Box.View_Quality: Central view from the best vantage point, exceptionally immersive.
Presidential Box.Unique_Features: Luxury seating, highest level of privacy and exclusivity.
Presidential Box.Accessibility: VIP access with personal assistance, best access routes.
Presidential Box.Special_Perks: Gourmet dining options, meet-and-greet opportunities with players.

VIP Seats.Description: Premium seats with excellent pitch views and exclusive benefits at the heart of the action.
VIP Seats.View_Quality: Unmatched side views, close to the action.
VIP Seats.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating, complimentary snacks and beverages.
VIP Seats.Special_Perks: Access to VIP lounges, special events invitations.

Grandstand.Description: Elevated side views for an optimal viewing experience, offering a comprehensive view of the pitch.
Grandstand.View_Quality: Excellent perspective of the entire pitch, clear line of sight.
Grandstand.Unique_Features: Good balance of view quality and ticket price.
Grandstand.Accessibility: Easy access, available facilities for guests with disabilities.
Grandstand.Special_Perks: A popular choice among regular fans for its great value.

General Admission.Description: Affordable tickets providing access to vibrant atmosphere areas, where the heart of the fan base resides.
General Admission.View_Quality: Dynamic view of the game, engaging fan experience.
General Admission.Unique_Features: Access to the heart of the fan sections, lively atmosphere.
General Admission.Accessibility: Standard access, dedicated areas for wheelchair users.
General Admission.Special_Perks: Part of the passionate fan base, traditional stadium experience.

restaurants_bars.name: El Balconcillo del Call
restaurants_bars.address: Calle Real de la Plaza, 8, 35001 Las Palmas, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: Located in the historic district of Las Palmas, this cozy eatery offers traditional Canarian cuisine, focusing on local dishes and wines.

restaurants_bars.name: La Terraza
restaurants_bars.address: Plaza de Santa Ana, 13, 35001 Las Palmas, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A picturesque restaurant located in a historic plaza, serving innovative Mediterranean cuisine with an emphasis on seasonal and local ingredients.

restaurants_bars.name: Restaurante Aromas
restaurants_bars.address: Calle de Los Martínez de Escobar, 10, 35007 Las Palmas, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A Michelin-guide mentioned restaurant offering an exquisite dining experience with dishes that merge traditional flavors with modern techniques.

restaurants_bars.name: Mar Báltico
restaurants_bars.address: Calle del General Vives, 7, 35007 Las Palmas, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: An elegant establishment known for its inventive cuisine and extensive wine selection, situated near the beachfront in Las Palmas.

restaurants_bars.name: Antiguos Sabores
restaurants_bars.address: Calle de los Caldereros, 14, 35001 Las Palmas, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: A gastrobar celebrated for its fusion tapas and assortment of local and international wines, set in a cozy atmosphere with vintage decor.

restaurants_bars.name: Cuchara y Tenedor
restaurants_bars.address: Plaza de la Feria, 7, 35003 Las Palmas, Spain
restaurants_bars.description: Located in the bustling Plaza de la Feria, this restaurant offers a modern twist on Canarian cuisine, focusing on tapas and small plates.

accommodations.name: AC Hotel Gran Canaria
accommodations.address: Calle Eduardo Benot, 3-5, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
accommodations.description: This towering hotel offers breathtaking views of the city and ocean, featuring modern rooms and amenities perfect for guests attending UD Las Palmas matches.

accommodations.name: Santa Catalina, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
accommodations.address: Calle León y Castillo, 227, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
accommodations.description: Nestled in the picturesque Ciudad Jardín, this historic hotel offers luxurious accommodations and is conveniently located for exploring the city and attending football games.

accommodations.name: Sercotel Hotel Cristina Las Palmas
accommodations.address: Calle Gomera, 6, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
accommodations.description: Overlooking Las Canteras Beach, this hotel provides guests with elegant rooms and easy access to the city's attractions, including the Estadio Gran Canaria.

accommodations.name: Hotel Reina Isabel
accommodations.address: Calle Alfredo L. Jones, 40, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
accommodations.description: Situated on the beachfront, this hotel offers luxurious facilities including a rooftop pool, ideal for relaxation after attending a UD Las Palmas match.

accommodations.name: Hotel Concorde
accommodations.address: Calle Tomás Miller, 85, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
accommodations.description: Centrally located near the beach and shopping areas, this hotel provides comfortable accommodations with easy access to Estadio Gran Canaria.

accommodations.name: Hotel THe Fataga Centro de Negocios
accommodations.address: Calle Néstor de la Torre, 21, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
accommodations.description: This hotel is designed for business and leisure travelers, offering modern rooms and meeting facilities in the heart of Las Palmas, convenient for football fans.

tourist_attractions.name: Las Canteras Beach
tourist_attractions.address: Paseo de Las Canteras, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A stunning urban beach known for its golden sands and clear waters, offering a lively promenade with a variety of restaurants and cafes, ideal for relaxation and water sports.

tourist_attractions.name: Santa Ana Cathedral
tourist_attractions.address: Plaza Santa Ana, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Located in the historic Vegueta district, this cathedral is a blend of Gothic and neoclassical styles, offering visitors a glimpse into the island's rich cultural heritage.

tourist_attractions.name: Pérez Galdós House-Museum
tourist_attractions.address: Calle Cano, 2, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: Dedicated to the life and works of the famous Spanish writer Benito Pérez Galdós, this museum is housed in his birthplace, showcasing manuscripts, furniture, and personal belongings.

tourist_attractions.name: Canarian Museum
tourist_attractions.address: Calle Doctor Chil, 25, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: This museum offers a comprehensive exploration of the Canary Islands' pre-Hispanic history, with extensive collections of aboriginal artifacts, making it a key cultural site.

tourist_attractions.name: Jardín Botánico Canario Viera y Clavijo
tourist_attractions.address: Carretera del Centro, Km 7, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: The largest botanical garden in Spain, dedicated to the flora of the Canary Islands, offering a peaceful retreat with beautiful plant displays and educational exhibits.

tourist_attractions.name: Casa de Colón
tourist_attractions.address: Calle Colón, 1, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain
tourist_attractions.description: A museum focusing on the history of the Canary Islands and their relationship with America, housed in a beautiful historic building that Columbus is said to have visited.

team_related_activities.name: UD Las Palmas Official Store
team_related_activities.address: Estadio Gran Canaria, Calle Fondos del Segura, s/n, 35019 Las Palmas, Spain
team_related_activities.description: The official store for UD Las Palmas merchandise, offering a wide range of team apparel and accessories at the Estadio Gran Canaria.

team_related_activities.name: UD Las Palmas Match Day Experience
team_related_activities.address: Estadio Gran Canaria, Calle Fondos del Segura, s/n, 35019 Las Palmas, Spain
team_related_activities.description: Attend a UD Las Palmas game at the Estadio Gran Canaria to experience the passion and atmosphere of one of Spain's historic football clubs.

team_related_activities.name: UD Las Palmas Football Camp
team_related_activities.description: Football camps for young fans and aspiring players, offering coaching and training in the sport under the guidance of UD Las Palmas professionals.

team_related_activities.name: Meet & Greet with UD Las Palmas Players
team_related_activities.address: Specific events at Estadio Gran Canaria
team_related_activities.description: Special events organized for fans to meet their favorite UD Las Palmas players, get autographs, and take photos.

team_related_activities.name: UD Las Palmas Community Outreach Programs
team_related_activities.address: Various community centers and schools in Las Palmas
team_related_activities.description: Community programs and initiatives led by UD Las Palmas, promoting sportsmanship, teamwork, and football among youth in Las Palmas.

options.description: Las Palmas' city bus network provides convenient access to Estadio Gran Canaria, with several lines stopping near the stadium, facilitating easy access for visitors.
options.directions: Check the Guaguas Municipales website for bus schedules, routes, and real-time updates.

options.description: Las Palmas offers a bike sharing service, making it easy and sustainable to reach Estadio Gran Canaria, with bike parking available at the venue.
options.directions: Plan your route with BiciPalma to find the most convenient and safe path to the stadium.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best seat selections for UD Las Palmas games.

best_places_to_buy.name: Entradas.com
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable ticketing partner offering tickets for various events, including UD Las Palmas games, within Spain.

best_places_to_buy.name: Resale Platforms
best_places_to_buy.description: Check reputable resale platforms for tickets, especially for sold-out games. Ensure the platform offers buyer protection and is authorized to sell UD Las Palmas tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Look for family packages or group discounts for savings. Mid-week games may offer lower prices compared to weekend games. Sign up for the team's newsletter for promotional deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Purchase tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be cautious of offers that seem too good to be true, and verify the authenticity of tickets when buying from resale sites.
